classification.task_goal: Merge sub-images into a panorama using keypoint description methods and compare their performance.
primary_constraints: Use only numpy for the implementation of the functions.
Implement the find_homography_ransac function without using any libraries other than numpy.
Implement the merge_images function without using any libraries other than numpy.
classification.reasoning: The assistant initially violated the constraints by using OpenCV functions, which was against the user's explicit requirement to use only numpy. The user pointed out the violation, and the assistant subsequently repaired the implementation by providing a numpy-only solution.
